ticket.title: load_path is expecting a String in the application.rb generator
ticket.original-body:
It's only a commented line but I think lots of people will try to use it and if you happen to run ruby 1.9.1 (1.8.7 works fine) then you get this error: 
can't convert Pathname into String
patch is here http://github.com/TomK32/rails/commit/b7a54c68637f9d91ccd5750e76c50bdc314ab4bb error occurred with ruby 1.9.1, mod_passenger 2.2.9 and latest rails 3.0.0.beta
